author: Reuters
title: JPMorgan's Dimon warns unvaccinated New York staff could be terminated
description: Unvaccinated New York-based staff at JPMorgan Chase risk losing their jobs, Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said on Monday in a further indication that banks are getting tougher on employees as they return to work.

description: JPMorgan Chase & Co (JPM.N) Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon will get a 9.5% raise in annual pay, bringing his total compensation for 2021 to $34.5 million, the bank said on Thursday.
